titleStmt.title: The praise of a godly vvoman A sermon preached at the solemne funerall of the right honourable ladie, the Ladie Frances Roberts, at Lanhide-rock-Church in Cornwall, the tenth of August, 1626. By Hanniball Gamon, minister of the word of God, at St. Maugan in the same countie.
titleStmt.author: Gamon, Hannibal, b. 1581 or 2.

titleStmt.title: The praise of a godly vvoman A sermon preached at the solemne funerall of the right honourable ladie, the Ladie Frances Roberts, at Lanhide-rock-Church in Cornwall, the tenth of August, 1626. By Hanniball Gamon, minister of the word of God, at St. Maugan in the same countie.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] H[aviland] for Iohn Grismond, and are to be sold at his shop in Ivie-Lane at the signe of the Gunne,
